channel.title: GreatXscape V2 Adventure beyond expectation
channel.description:
GreatXScape V2 [center][center][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/1zqgf43.png[/img][/center] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2qlv1qu.jpg[/img] WEBSITE [url=http://greatxscape.org/]http://greatxscape.org/[/url] FORUMS [url=http://greatxscape.ipbhost.com/]http://greatxscape.ipbhost.com/[/url] CLIENT DL LINK [url=http://greatxscape.org/downloads/GreatXscape.jar]http://greatxscape.org/downloads/GreatXscape.jar[/url] [/center]
GreatXscape is a free-to-play runescape private server bringing you only the best and most unique content available. We're powered by a powerful dedicated server for a no-lag and downtime-free environment for you to experience our server for hours without every losing connection.
[b] DEDICATED STAFF[/b] Dedicated staff team tends to your every need, so you wont feel left out or abused
[b] All of your favorite minigames to play! [/b] We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):
Fight Caves Fight Kiln Barrows Brothers Crucible Domionion Tower
[b]Sell your hard earned items for the price you want[/b]
Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.
Add your items and edit your price Change price at any time Lock your store so you dont get screwed Check original value to ensure you aren't being scammed
Come and Check it !
[img]http://www.foxtrot-rsps.com/assets/images/screens/Screenshot_2.png[/img]
[img]http://www.foxtrot-rsps.com/assets/images/screens/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [img]http://www.foxtrot-rsps.com/assets/images/screens/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [img]http://www.foxtrot-rsps.com/assets/images/screens/Screenshot_4.png[/img]

item.title: GreatXscape V2 Adventure beyond expectation
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

GreatXScape V2
[center][center][/center]

WEBSITE
http://greatxscape.org/
FORUMS
http://greatxscape.ipbhost.com/
CLIENT DL LINK
http://greatxscape.org/downloads/GreatXscape.jar
[/center]

GreatXscape is a free-to-play runescape private server bringing you only the best and most unique content available. We’re powered by a powerful dedicated server for a no-lag and downtime-free environment for you to experience our server for hours without every losing connection.


DEDICATED STAFF
Dedicated staff team tends to your every need, so you wont feel left out or abused


All of your favorite minigames to play!

We have all of your favorite minigames that are easy to access and well rewarding. Some of these include (but are definitely not limited to):

Fight Caves
Fight Kiln
Barrows Brothers
Crucible
Domionion Tower

Sell your hard earned items for the price you want

Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.

Add your items and edit your price
Change price at any time
Lock your store so you dont get screwed
Check original value to ensure you aren’t being scammed

Come and Check it !
